tool.name: nsis
tool.summary: Set construction variables for the &b-NSISInstaller; builder.

builder.name: NSISInstaller
builder.summary: The &b-NSISInstaller; builder creates MS Windows installers from .nsi files.

cvar.name: NSISDEFINES
cvar.summary: A dictionary with variables that will be passed to NSIS on the command line via -Dkey=value.

cvar.name: NSISFLAGS
cvar.summary: A list of flags that will be passed to NSIS on the command line. Note that NSIS will accept flags as -flag on both Windows and other platforms.
